description:
Allowed a temporary leave from Arthra, a happy Nanoha is able to visit family and friends. Presea blames Fate for the failure in collecting the Jewel Seeds, which is the last straw for Alph. So Nanoha comes to a decision about the latest incident...
Source: Amazon

titles.title: Sorezore no Mune no Chikai na no
These Are the Vows in Each of Our Hearts
それぞれの胸の誓いなの
